scripts.dev:citizen: npm run transpile-citizen-modules && cd packages/citizen && npm start
scripts.dev:employee: npm run transpile-employee-modules && cd packages/employee && npm start
scripts.transpile-citizen-modules: npm run egov-ui-kit && npm run pgr-citizen && npm run pt-citizen && npm run egov-ui-framework
scripts.transpile-employee-modules: npm run egov-ui-kit && npm run pgr-employee && npm run pt-employee && npm run egov-ui-framework
scripts.egov-ui-kit-config: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/config --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/config --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-redux: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/redux --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/redux --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-utils: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/utils --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/utils --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-commons: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/common --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/common --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-hocs: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/hocs --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/hocs --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit-assets: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/egov-ui-kit-dev/src/assets --out-dir packages/egov-ui-kit/assets --copy-files
scripts.egov-ui-kit: npm run egov-ui-kit-components && npm run egov-ui-kit-redux && npm run egov-ui-kit-utils && npm run egov-ui-kit-commons && npm run egov-ui-kit-custom-icons && npm run egov-ui-kit-hocs && npm run egov-ui-kit-assets && npm run egov-ui-kit-config
scripts.pgr-citizen: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/pgr-citizen-dev/src --out-dir packages/pgr-citizen --copy-files
scripts.pt-citizen: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/pt-citizen-dev/src --out-dir packages/pt-citizen --copy-files
scripts.pgr-employee: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/pgr-employee-dev/src --out-dir packages/pgr-employee --copy-files
scripts.pt-employee: npm run build-css && babel dev-packages/pt-employee-dev/src --out-dir packages/pt-employee --copy-files
scripts.build-css: npm-run-all --parallel build-css-egov-ui-kit build-css-pgr-citizen build-css-egov-ui-framework-core build-css-egov-pgr-employee build-css-egov-pt-employee build-css-egov-pt-citizen
scripts.egov-ui-framework: npm run egov-ui-framework-redux && npm run egov-ui-framework-utils && npm run egov-ui-framework-atoms && npm run egov-ui-framework-molecules && npm run egov-ui-framework-containers && npm run egov-ui-framework-hocs && npm run egov-ui-framework-config
